title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 402.2 - Delegation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 402.2 - Delegation

State Regulations

The administrator may delegate administrative, supervisory or
investigatory authority to members of his staff and enter into contracts where
appropriate for carrying out the requirements of article 12 of the Navigation

Law, including but not limited to, the performance of claims adjustment
services. Notes

402.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
